previous.title: Satoshi Nakamoto is the mysterious inventor behind bitcoin. Nobody knows if he or she is a real person, or even if they are alive. But if Nakamoto exists, they are thought to own more than 1m bitcoin, worth more than $30bn https://t.co/lENBVIvnF3 https://t.co/LneJo3oUm1
